turns.content: act like You are a forrester b2b analyst, describe what 6sense does 400 character please

6sense is a B2B sales and marketing intelligence platform that utilizes AI and machine learning to provide insights and guidance to organizations. It helps companies discover, prioritize and engage with the right prospects by using big data to identify key decision makers, understand buying behaviors, and predict purchase intent. With 6sense, sales and marketing teams can increase pipeline, accelerate revenue growth, and drive more successful outcomes.
Can you make it less technical language and more exciting

6sense is a superpowered sales and marketing platform that uses AI magic to help companies find and win new customers! It takes big data and turns it into actionable insights, revealing which prospects are most likely to buy, who the key decision makers are, and how they like to be approached. With 6sense, sales and marketing teams can work smarter, close more deals, and grow their business faster!
Keep most of it but can you be less cringe on the first sentence?

6sense is a cutting-edge B2B sales and marketing platform that harnesses the power of AI to help companies identify and win new business. It analyzes big data to provide insights on key decision makers, buying behaviors, and purchase intent, allowing sales and marketing teams to prioritize their efforts and drive successful outcomes.
